top_stories.title: Commonwealth Fusion Systems installs reactor magnet, lands deal with Nvidia
top_stories.description: The fusion power frontrunner said that construction on its Sparc reactor was proceeding as planned. Meanwhile, it's building a digital twin to help dial it in.
top_stories.author: Tim De Chant
top_stories.content: The fusion power frontrunner said that construction on its Sparc reactor was proceeding as planned. Meanwhile, it's building a digital twin to help dial it in.

top_stories.title: Why 2026 is the Year Healthcare Trades Documentation for “Hireable” AI Agents
top_stories.description: For years, we’ve treated medical billing like a post-game wrap-up. A patient leaves, a scribe drafts a note, and days later, a back-office coder tries to decipher the clinical complexity from a static page. But in 2026, that delay is a death sentence for revenue. Payers have spent the last 24 months weaponizing AI to […]

top_stories.title: A Coding Implementation to Build a Unified Apache Beam Pipeline Demonstrating Batch and Stream Processing with Event-Time Windowing Using DirectRunner
top_stories.description: In this tutorial, we demonstrate how to build a unified Apache Beam pipeline that works seamlessly in both batch and stream-like modes using the DirectRunner. We generate synthetic, event-time–aware data and apply fixed windowing with triggers and allowed lateness to demonstrate how Apache Beam consistently handles both on-time and late events. top_stories.title: NVIDIA Rubin Platform, Open Models, Autonomous Driving: NVIDIA Presents Blueprint for the Future at CES
